channel.title: Moparcraft Community Games Area
channel.description: I've been thinking about making something like this for awhile, but alot of the games i have in mind involve some form of pvp including but not limited to: king of the hill, an actual pvp arena, and traps. My request is to have the permission to make this arena and also have pvp on in the area so that many of the games can infact be made. In order to give fair warning to people who play the games there will be warning signs along with the descriptions of the game warning if death is possible.

item.title: Moparcraft Community Games Area
item.dc:creator: @triston001 triston001
item.description:
@triston001 wrote:

[quote=“kickingjamie, post:24, topic:469951”]As Tom is set in his ways and pvp games won’t happen. Would you guys still be interested in a community games arena?

We could have spleef, mazes, races, enderpearl golf and whatever else you can think off.[/quote]
i’ve been wanting to build my 3 games but havnt had a set location to build them at. i was going to build a games center 4 months ago, but then discarded the idea. my games are: Climb! Sand Tower, Race! Ice Course, and Hop! Lava Sprint.

the started games center foundation is still there if anyone want to help me construct my game center dome.

Read full topic

item.title: Moparcraft Community Games Area
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

I support this suggestion, for me the current PVP area of the map is useless - I mean the main person who suggested it doesn’t even play anymore…

I really think that if we had an active blossoming community that they’d rather play king of the hill and other small pvp games then having to run around half a map trying to find people.

Read full topic

item.title: Moparcraft Community Games Area
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Well that’s what the wild is about, that’s what PVP is about. We can’t just port everything into the other side of the world because it’s more convenient, as it defeats the object of having the wild in the first place. I understand what you’re saying but it’s like with spleef/splief arenas people wanted a plugin and a system that was unique to it, so the effectively wanted administrative intervention which is something that I don’t agree with.

If the members of the community are going to create something then they should do it with what everybody has built using in the past, and that’s the core building blocks of MineCraft, and not a plugin that allows you to have a one off change to make it easier. It isn’t a case off “what plugins/changes could this work with” but rather “what way can I make this creation to work with the current plugins/server”.

If someone wants to create a giant snowman which fires snow then go ahead, but we’re not giving you a plugin to make it move properly.

Read full topic
